verses.name: John 13:18
verses.text: I speak not of you all: I know whom I have chosen: but that the scripture may be fulfilled, He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me.

verses.name: John 13:19
verses.text: Now I tell you before it come, that, when it is come to pass, ye may believe that I am he.

verses.name: John 13:20
verses.text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.
